input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker 8" x 2"

Item specifications:
Size: 8" x 2"
Long-Lasting, All-Weather Outdoor Grade Vinyl, UV and Water Resistant
Apply to Any Surface - car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, metal, etc.
Apply to dry and clean surfaces.
Die cut around the image
Easy Application - Peel & Stick, Removable & Reusable

Product description

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
The G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker is a long-lasting and durable sticker that is UV and water resistant. It can be applied to any surface, including car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, metal, etc. The sticker is made of high-quality vinyl material and is die-cut around the image for a professional look. The sticker is easy to apply - just peel and stick - and can be removed and reused multiple times. Show your patriotism and support for the G.I. JOE team with this awesome car bumper sticker!

Respond using simple language, catchy phrases and emotional appeal to connect with the target audience.
Product description:
Show your love for G.I. JOE with this awesome car bumper sticker! Made of high-quality vinyl material, this long-lasting and durable sticker is UV and water resistant, and can be applied to any surface. The sticker is die-cut around the image for a professional look, and is easy to apply - just peel and stick. The sticker is reusable and can be removed multiple times, so you can change up your look whenever you want. Show your support for the Real American Hero team with this cool and patriotic sticker!
input_text.Response B: Ah, this is a bumper sticker advertising the G.I. Joe Real American Hero action figure.  The sticker is made of high-quality, long-lasting vinyl, so it is suitable for outdoor use and will resist fading, peeling, and water damage.  It can be applied to any smooth surface, such as a car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, or metal, and can be easily removed and reused as desired.  The text on the sticker emphasizes the G.I. Joe action figure's status as a "Real American Hero," which is intended to generate pride and admiration in the viewer.  Overall, this sticker is a fun and effective way to promote the G.I. Joe brand and demonstrate support for American military heroes.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Both responses failed to follow the directions and left out mentioning the second items specification.
